author: Kitadashi

text: It really saddens me, that as gamers, we all ways ask for new and orginal experiences. We don't want to play the same thing twice, so when a company like clover come along and really do something new and original, the masses simply ingnore it, and continue to play on there fps's. This means that more and more companys end up producing the same types of games, I dont know about anybody reading this, but I feel that this spells a worring future for video games.

text:

Very epic moment. Even more epic music. 5 stars, and favored.
